author: richselby
title: We Dig this Digger
review:
Without a doubt, this is my 1 year old's favourite toy. He's a big fun of construction site toys in general and has various toy diggers, mixers, cranes etc. But the one he loves most is this large Duplo digger. Something about the range of movement available seems to really appeal. He sets up a pile of 2x2 bricks and transfers them in the bucket from one pile to another. He also enjoys seating a Duplo figure at the controls, and hiding tools in the compartment in the back.

It's composed of  a few large custom parts, with limited opportunity to attach to other parts, which is a shame. I'd love to attach the caterpillar tracked base to a different Duplo top, but this is not possible. Sadly, the centre joint soon lost it's grip, so there's not quite enough strength to keep it extended, meaning the arm goes a little floppy. 

Still, I'd be happy to recommend this set to any parents of digger-mad toddlers.
